channel.title: 世界 - 最新 - Google新闻

item.title: “我只是走了出去”：印度航空坠机的唯一幸存者分享了他的故事-NPR
item.description: '我刚走了出去'：印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者分享了他的故事＆nbsp; npr <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqgFBVV95cUxQbS0taXk4YjFkclpUNFFjSk42QVNJaTNZUThiZkpIYks0U0Z2ZFBObmsxdkd4dERfSWRtLS1FVUFRblNDTX fpyjbksjhgy0dwvu9ix3zsawflrgdnoe9vvdhobwkyd002nlqts0hqccvuz1pmuhl0q1c4t mrhcgdqc2pub2dsbfdvnmdwu2rksefnogrvelz6z2vvsggzulrgnldvmtr4t1uzzw？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>座位11A中的乘客如何成为印度空气崩溃的唯一幸存者＆nbsp; 纽约时报href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmic0fvx3lxtfa3njdfekz2x1hoqtdiz295bmpndtrubuzwls1funr2whrib ehmtediwet2xzd6te44sly1vkl2ovlzt0hpt3vnui1bcettrw42mmhumlpxsmk5cm5cm5cmexsssssulpuvntszd4ogjzws12s12s1mxn0hgbmm？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>关于印度航空航班171 ＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 波音新闻编辑室 '流量救了我'：学生错过了印度空气崩溃仅10分钟＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc ‘奇迹般的’：座位上的乘客如何生存印度空气崩溃？＆nbsp; 守护者

item.title: 以色列罢工杀死了一些伊朗最有权势的人，包括军事和核领导人-CNN
item.description: 以色列罢工杀死了一些伊朗最有权势的男人，包括军事和核领导人＆nbsp; nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmivefvx3lxte91zlvhaxdttgpzq1u1zmnnnwm51 CZVEVK5KSKYTWUJ5N21TDDWGWMKT1LWM1LXUWAKMYC010VFLGETLUSG1HRFQ1WTDVWTDVWTDVWTGZMWG1M2TARA？ Target =“ _ blank”>实时更新：以色列罢工伊朗的核网站，杀死了高层军事领导人和科学家 ＆nbsp; ap ap news> ap news 伊朗正在从以色列的前所未有的攻击中卷起 - 这可能只有开始 href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxPVWRqMVVYN1lIMUdXLUZQUDZSSk9xbUc4bUE4SmxJZFgtSDdmZ3owc0FhMUI4bVpEcHVWSmdDeVFne s1sywjdmucxytnhtnhtm0wcdbjz1bqrs01b1drslyznkj6sururgwxt3gzc05fyxyxyxyxy5alnwc3bhsne5uknab0xbk0uknaberwckk0 ablwck0 VNIVXLFSE9TDMTAY9IBUAFBVV95CUXPSG9XNWFLUFDPTC1BBNZPUKVKME1IRWZLSHJULU41EDN0B013RHRHRHRHRHR3TDTDTDDDDDDDDDDDJZZ084DJVNSIBDVNSIBDVWNJRFEFCNJLSSES​​SESSESSESSESSSESSE TQ2M2S2CJZXCENACETUBNRXOUHFS1LWNUZKQUF2YLFQRWNLR3L0AFBXOFBXOFVVVTGDGLJVDFVDFFHKZVFHKZVLKZVVLKZVVBVVBVVBM目标=“ _ blank”>在以色列在伊朗的秘密战争内部：摩萨德突击队，隐藏无人机和震惊的德黑兰＆nbsp; nbsp; 6f6f6f“> fox news href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmid0fvx3lxte9hwjhiykljumthekfcmxhwdv9kourkourkvku5m29lsg9numwzcng 4TFH0U2STA041BEPQD2DRBHFVAS0YEMMXC0RBAXLOUK1RVE5IDVRBCEXFDEDERER2TVEFA4YNP5RS0WB2PSDPPSDUJPCERQMWPCERQMWTFMWTFMWTFMWSWSWSWSWSWSWSWSWCM8W？ Target =“ _ Blank”>以色列罢工伊朗的核计划，杀死高级军事官员：实时更新＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报

item.title: 朝鲜声称军舰在第二次尝试中成功推出-BBC
item.description: 朝鲜要求军舰在第二次尝试＆nbsp; bbc n韩国的金眼更多的军舰随着受损的驱逐舰重新推出＆nbsp; al Jazeera 卫星图像显示，受损的朝鲜军舰搬到了俄罗斯边境附近的德莱库克＆nbsp; cnn 气球和人力力量：朝鲜如何使倒塌的军舰＆nbsp; nbsp; 《纽约时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmijwfbvv95cuxndg5pyjbdb3czy09hb1fwwhhh3ddddddddddpmjbteu5ms0hqahb6a2hhahhahdzs E1ndjN4UE5PemhSS3JkeWthRFJNeGNDZE5pcXM3U2Fmc241d2k3ZW0zRmQ4MWlyZnhDQzZsQ05CbmhnbUV2bUVNX0dQX05LTFU4M1l5bTNfWHhlR LJPQW94EFHZCDRZY9IBLAFBVV95CUXOYLVCYMJKBFZMD29WRZVUQTI0OVJGBGBGTMDZBAM3LRMXYTLRMXYTLVVVVGGYMMZHSVGYMMZHSVPPPPPPPPPPPPPPEZZVJSU9IR0ZHOTRZVE5TTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT0XWM mnxtgzym2r5ajztai1uuzj0qvhstdnxzkxaT0hguxRyewzasnhsnhsnhsnhsnhsnhsnmjsqzfdtvbuyjdfqkkvwwwgtrsejkkskkkkskkitam1nvwwpvrfhqcccccv9t？ Target =“ _ Blank”>朝鲜声称已成功修复并重新推入了其受损的驱逐舰＆nbsp; nbsp; cnn> cnn
